name: Tactical Insight
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Quests & Campaigns © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: Choose a single army tactic. You grant mastery of this tactic to the target army for the spell's duration. This tactic may bring an army's total known tactics to a number greater than normally allowed.
text_zh: 选择一个单一的军队战术。你在法术持续时间内将这一战术运用到目标军队上。这一战术会让军队的已知战术超出其通常允许的数量。
